wikipedia_page.main:
Henry  Burton-Peters (12 January 1792 – 24 November 1874 ) was an English Whig and  Liberal  politician who sat in the House of Commons from 1830 to 1837.
Peters was the son of Henry Peters and Charlotte Mary Morrison, daughter of General George Morrison.In 1830, Burton-Peters was elected as a Member of Parliament (MP) for Beverley. He held the seat until 1837.Burton-Peters married three times. He married his third wife Mary Cartwright in 1870. They lived at 35 Brock Street, Bath.

response: * Henry Burton-Peters (1792–1874), English Whig Member of Parliament for Beverley (1830–1837)
